title: How to show my number is switched off while I am using my phone - Quora

response.answer_text: Haha you can depending upon your operator. You can divert/forward your incoming calls unconditionally Or when busy to some other number which is switched off. So whenever someone dials your no it will be forwarded to the switched off number and called person will hear switched off announcement and can you continue using your number. Hope it helps. Cheers, Saurabh PS: This reminds me of my college days.
